company

This module exposes functions related to the /company and /companies paths.

Source:

(inner) activate(opts) → {Promise}

POST /companies/activate Activates a company.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
opts Object

An options params which is usually already bound by connect functions.
Source:
  • resources/company.js, line 56
Returns:

A promise that resolves to the newly created company's data or to an error.
